summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2652 for the improvement of Fifth Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-seventh Street to East Fiftieth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by concrete walks, grading where necessary, and watermains of proper dimensions and materials together with all gates, tees, crosses, hydrants and other appurtenance necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district under Ordinance No. 31203, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
